sub_title: Board advisor, Professor, Entrepreneur, (Supervisory) Board Member.
summary: Highly experienced Board Member and Advisor with a proven track record in strategy, management, and technology. Skilled in analytical thinking, innovation management and business development. Holds an academic position as a professor at the University of Twente for more than 20 years.

De activiteiten van de Stichting Beeldkracht omvatten onder andere:
- het vervaardigen van documentaires (in september 2013: DementieEnDan)
